results.content: I started out really enjoying this course until I got to lesson 10, the most basic explanation possible on Div and Span with an advanced "submit" assignment which appears to require knowledge of nested divs, divs within divs, to create a 3x2 grid of pictures with text.  The link to an XML clue didn't work. If you want us to see an example, you should provide a link to FrameworkTV.com. I posted a question to Q/A, saving this assignment for later while I work ahead.
